title.value: V2 Table Code System: Observation Result Status Codes Interpretation

description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts which specify observation result status. These codes reflect the current completion status of the results for one Observation Identifier. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the OBX segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0085 (Observation Result Status Codes Interpretation)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was first defined
Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
Whether code is considered 'backwards compatible' (whatever that means)

display.value: Amended based on adjustments provided by the Placer (Physician) regarding patient demographics (such as age and/or gender or other patient specific information

definition.value: Amended based on adjustments provided by the Placer (Physician) regarding patient demographics (such as age and/or gender or other patient specific information

display.value: Appended Report - Final results reviewed and further information provided for clarity without change to the original result values.

definition.value: Appended Report - Final results reviewed and further information provided for clarity without change to the original result values.

display.value: Record coming over is a correction and thus replaces a final result

definition.value: Record coming over is a correction and thus replaces a final result

display.value: Not asked; used to affirmatively document that the observation identified in the OBX was not sought when the universal service ID in OBR-4 implies that it would be sought.

definition.value: Not asked; used to affirmatively document that the observation identified in the OBX was not sought when the universal service ID in OBR-4 implies that it would be sought.

display.value: Partial results. Deprecated. Retained only for backward compatibility as of V2.6.

definition.value: Partial results. Deprecated. Retained only for backward compatibility as of V2.6.

display.value: Verified - Final results reviewed and confirmed to be correct, no change to result value, normal range or abnormal flag

definition.value: Verified - Final results reviewed and confirmed to be correct, no change to result value, normal range or abnormal flag

display.value: Results cannot be obtained for this observation

definition.value: Results cannot be obtained for this observation

display.value: Results status change to final without retransmitting results already sent as 'preliminary.' E.g., radiology changes status from preliminary to final

definition.value: Results status change to final without retransmitting results already sent as 'preliminary.' E.g., radiology changes status from preliminary to final

display.value: Post original as wrong, e.g., transmitted for wrong patient

definition.value: Post original as wrong, e.g., transmitted for wrong patient
